tweets.text:
Ahead of heavy rain anticipated over the coming few days, our Officers are currently installing temporary defences in Ribchester, #Lancashire. 

#beprepared #floodaware https://t.co/gGR0EsIdPP

My last visit as #Ops Manager for ⁦@EnvAgencyMids⁩, so pleased to be able to see 2 of the 6 new pumps at #Keadby pumping station, side by side with the 81yr old pumps. The old pumps are being decommissioned one by one, to ensure we are able to maintain pumping capacity. https://t.co/zankQoLqOW

urls.title: Find out if you're at risk of flooding in England
urls.description: Check your risk of flooding: get current flood warnings, check the 5-day forecast or use flood maps

tweets.text: Here’s our Officer Amber Hatch-Walling with an update on what we’ve been doing in #Lancashire. Check your flood risk and keep up to date on the latest situation: https://t.co/ZAITy41Ta6 https://t.co/SJ3d7fuXqv

A great day out to see #Hillylaid #Wetland #Project with @TM_WRT . THIS is what partnership working is all about! From concept as a result of @EnvAgencyNW & @b_and_fc project many years ago, to delivery on the ground funded by @natural_course @unitedutilities @wyrecouncil 👏
And the @EnvAgency does what exactly? https://t.co/GbRf12Csn1
@johncurtinEA @hancloke @EnvAgency Please, what is light and dark green in the second image?

21 containers of illegally exported waste sent to Sri Lanka have successfully returned to England.

We will investigate who exported this #WasteCrime. 

Those responsible could face 2 years in prison, and an unlimited fine.

Read more here: https://t.co/ti1Wt6XYYP https://t.co/a347mSYEpi

A flood alert has been issued for the River Irwell catchment in Greater Manchester. 

For details visit https://t.co/s7vbL44pF8

#prepareactsurvive #floodaware #GreaterManchester

If you don’t pick up after your dog, who will? 

Don’t make the mistake of thinking someone else will clean up your dog's poo after you. 

Always #BagItBinIt to make sure we keep our water safe!

#BinIt4Beaches #RespectProtectEnjoy https://t.co/w11KmcBBJ8

3⃣   @EnvAgencyNW @EnvAgency: ring the Environment Agency Floodline on 0345 988 1188 to report a flood or if your property is at risk of flooding from a reservoir, river or coastal water.

4⃣   Call 105 to report a power cut or get updates when your electricity has been cut off.

Emma Howard Boyd, the chair of @EnvAgency, has said her organisation “does not have the resources it needs” to effectively protect the environment, in response to new research which has highlighted a “huge gap” in UK regulatory enforcement capacity.

https://t.co/74iRG0EoIJ
Watching the river and weather my thoughts are with those communities at risk... please be #floodaware I know those local to me the @EnvAgencyNW are working hard https://t.co/Cm9dfHSh2U

In Haverhill,Suffolk they are proposing to build upto 16,000 houses.The parish council of the nearby village of Linton are concerned of the affect of building so many houses,on the River Granta,which is a chalk stream.@RussellB1ggs @ChalkStreamMon @AquiferChalk

The first wave of rain (of many to come I’m afraid) is passing through - here’s the 12 hour rainfall totals so far. Please sign up to our flood warnings and check your flood risk before wave two! https://t.co/gfaL38C2kU #floodaware https://t.co/3qBp40nUFN

Following today's rain 🌨️, there's a lot of water on the regions roads.

Never drive through flood water. 

Just one eggcup of water is enough to wreck your engine! 🚗 https://t.co/82dZn7Mrfz

There is currently 1 flood warning and 5 flood alerts in force for parts of #Cumbria and #Lancashire. 

Check the latest online 👉 https://t.co/uGQ4g6A5Xn 

Make sure you're prepared and up to date with the current situation. 

#prepareactsurvive #floodaware

Our Community Information Officers have been out giving advice & updates, ahead of the wet weather, to residents in communities across the #NorthWest today. 

Here they are in Cockermouth 

Stay safe & check your local #flood risk 👉 https://t.co/uGQ4g6RGOV https://t.co/XDEQ9XiUja

🌧 will continue through to approx 3am. Becoming more patchy but still heavy at times / some places. This may mean some of @EnvAgencyNW #flood storage areas are used. Still in the balance. #floodaware https://t.co/VgvBiD2q0E
Disgusting situation & has been going on for years 😬 Why isn’t the EA preventing it @EnvAgency @JamesBevanEA @EmmaHowardBoyd ? https://t.co/cxP6WYcTde

tweets.text:
More big news! The ICO has told @EnvAgency that it must permit re-use of its Large Raised Reservoirs dataset (AfA134) under the Open Government Licence. https://t.co/eQPKXnx5I2 #RoPSIR #FOI/EIRs #floodrisk #defradata

Epic win for #opendata and the unnamed but heroic complainant.

tweets.text:
"During four days in February the plant released some 135 million litres of untreated wastewater", directly into the Thames.

At what point I wonder does @MPGeorgeEustice realise that the biggest liability @DefraGovUK has is the @EnvAgency?

https://t.co/jcePfc7PVT

We're excited to release a podcast for #LondonRiversWeek with @ThamesEstPart @EnvAgency & @SE_Rivers_Trust. Listen to some of London's river restoration success stories, including how the brown trout population returned to the river #Wandle 🐟 Listen now 👉https://t.co/30v7m5Et8h https://t.co/QEEXNmLzGt

For #LondonRiversWeek2020, we have a brand new #TalkoftheThames podcast!
 
This special edition discusses the key messages of London Rivers Week with a panel of speakers from across the Thames Estuary including from @Thames21 @EnvAgency @SE_Rivers_Trust! 
https://t.co/2Cq93B9k8s https://t.co/UCnQE2XxfA
Our teams right across the country are preparing and responding to the heavy rainfall. We'll have staff working 24/7 over the next few days. Follow @EnvAgency https://t.co/EO7xjiC084

⚠️ Now is the time to check your pumps and other property flood resilience measures are in good working order. To find out more on how you could increase the resilience of your property from #groundwater flooding go to https://t.co/GBA53AuCpi ⚠️ https://t.co/3p25RyA3bX

Carrying out maintenance works today for @EnvAgencyYNE on Fleet Drain in Hessle with some of our specialist equipment to operate safely and efficiently in poor weather conditions @SpearheadWorld @McConnelPower @Energreensrl https://t.co/IClCW1j5Xr

If you live in #Collingham, #Wetherby, #ThorpeArch, #BostonSpa or #Linton, we’d like to hear about your experiences of #flooding to help shape plans to reduce #flood risk along the River #Wharfe. Give your views to @Leeds_Highways here: https://t.co/5dzl2qUtpo https://t.co/aiJ1WGCkRN

urls.title: Find out if you're at risk of flooding in England

urls.title: Flood warnings for England - GOV.UK
urls.description: Check your risk of flooding: get current flood warnings, river and sea levels, check the 5-day forecast or use flood risk maps

tweets.text:
The forecast of more 🌧️ brings the risk of #flood for the #NorthWest. Are you prepared?

Step 1. Check your flood risk 👉https://t.co/ce9vZ9i1P3 (it takes less than a minute to check)

Step 2. Sign up for free flood warnings

Step 3. Keep up to date 👉https://t.co/uGQ4g6A5Xn https://t.co/iHAHwuJ9PS
@johncurtinEA @AndynBrown16 @EnvAgency 29.4mm here in E Lancs (near Burnley) since 0000Z

We're expecting heavy rain across the North East and Yorkshire this weekend with increased risk of flooding. 

You can check the latest information on flood warnings and alerts here: https://t.co/OVBXgMyngb

#flood 
#flooding 
#rain 
#weather https://t.co/5owx8pl9el

tweets.text: @EnvAgencyYNE Have you signed up for ‘FREE’ Flood Earnings yet.. check it out here:

KEY CONTACTS: FLOODING INCIDENTS

1⃣   @LancashireCC is the Lead Local Flood Authority; call 0300 123 6780 if flooding is from highway drainage, surface water, groundwater or watercourses.

2⃣   @unitedutilities: call 0345 6723 723 if flooding is from sewers or burst water mains.

Day 78

2020 has more to give.

The public finding out about toxic #PFOS and #PFAS chemicals in UK waters. 

 @EnvAgency @DefraWater @GeorgeMonbiot @carolecadwalla @BBCNews @Channel4News @jonsnowC4 @EnvAgencyYNE @WCL_News @annalom87 @GeorgeGreenwood https://t.co/De6yqpENLD

tweets.text: @EnvAgency Picked this up yesterday from just half an hour on the beach! https://t.co/j8uyfbEumS

Plastic from incontinence pads washed into the sea after a container spilled its load on to beaches has spread more than 10 miles up the coast.

Campaigners fear the plastic in the pads has been "torn to shreds" with some beaches "littered" with waste.https://t.co/lmWBNEKogc
The fish pass at Lower Mill on the Letcombe Brook is now completed and flowing well! Nice working with you @CainBio and thanks for the funding @EnvAgency https://t.co/DAmorl9lKq

Nature-based solutions on @WoodlandTrust Bolton #SmithillsEstate delivering for nature and #BigClimateFightback in #NorthernForest. Great p’ship work @EnvAgency @merseyforest @RibbleTrust @HeritageFundUK  @EmmaHowardBoyd @AndyBurnhamGM @DrewBennellick @ZacGoldsmith @pow_rebecca https://t.co/I9N8X6q7ZH

urls.title: Flooding - Lancashire County Council
urls.description: If there is an immediate risk to your life or you are trapped by flood water call 999.

tweets.text:
📲 Check your flood risk and be #FloodAware

ℹ️ See advice on our website for what to do before, during and after a #flood 💦https://t.co/DIeeg2p9To https://t.co/Sj8O5DdIoT

Trying to predict flood risk for friends by rivers based on forecast rainfall and experience from Storms Ciara and Dennis in February this year. The @Shoothill @GaugeMap service is so important for this. It gives communities usable access to @EnvAgency data. #floods #cumbria https://t.co/tRzwoXXBbb
@LancashireCC any chance of some sandbags to #Freckleton ? @unitedutilities @FyldePolice @fyldecouncil https://t.co/RnosqLEhrH

Great to see our newly installed #NFM features working well. We will be increasing surface roughness to further slow the flow by planting along the flow pathway with a native mix of trees. Project funding from @EnvAgency @BristolWater & contributions from @NorthSomersetC https://t.co/dL4FaauJaO

I see work has started on #DroppingwellTip But it was my understanding, according to @EnvAgency that the 'Tippers' couldn't do ANYTHING in the adjacent field.  I hope their activities are being closely monitored for strict compliance @RMBCPress @SarahChampionMP @stopdwelltip 😡😡 https://t.co/f2AghEj61j

tweets.text:
We've  teams out across the region inspecting our assets  preparing for the forecast of heavy rain. 

These photos are from Todmorden, Calderdale where we're bolstering our flood defences as a precaution.

Sign up to our free flood warning service  https://t.co/OVBXgMyngb
#Floods https://t.co/kwonQEXVFv

Today the @EnvAgency released the State of the Environment: Soil report which reiterates that soil's ability to perform vital ecosystem services is under serious threat. 

Read our reflections on soil health policy & the report here: https://t.co/uELi4NpbGj

#sustainablesoilsnow
Great to see it all coming together https://t.co/S3tauTULdv

tweets.text:
Scientists are now testing sewage samples to detect local #coronavirus outbreaks, even when people don't show symptoms.

This is a valuable step in supporting NHS Test and Trace.

Find out more: https://t.co/JEJxbk0ofA

#CovidSewageTesting @DHSCgovuk @EnvAgency https://t.co/4xdR82CtJo

tweets.text: @MossMo55 @JanetHughes @swardley @BeDifrent @EnvAgency Ha, I remember this, they served a purpose didn’t they. I’ve used them at DWP when trying to encourage teams to focus the bulk of their effort on their USP and simply leverage commoditised services - was always a team effort to build them and talk them through though 👍

@JanetHughes @swardley @BeDifrent I do remember the fantastic @swardley mapping we did at the @EnvAgency as part of the Digital Transformation for regulatory services.. credit to @ArchiDigitalGov for creating them -they enabled many valuable conversations.
